casebody.data:
JOHN CAWLEY v. EUGENE KETELTAS, et al., Exrs., &c.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Russell, J.

Decided November 22, 1880. Verdict directed for plaintiff, exceptions to be heard in the first instance at general term. Kelly & Macrae, for plaintiff. Henry W. Clark and Richard W. Stevenson, for defendants. Per Curiam.

Judgment reversed, with costs of appeal to appellant to abide event.
